title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Part 2—Battle Tendency, Vol. 1
description: The beginning of the Battle Tendency Arc! The Joestar family is called upon to do battle against evil again. This time, it’s Joseph Joestar, the grandson of Jonathan Joestar. And his enemies are more powerful and diabolical than ever. Behold! The terror of the Pillar Men!
author: Hirohiko Araki
